ayuda.descripcion: Find answers, tutorials and support to get started using your IoT platform.
ayuda.introDescripcion: This platform is designed to help you manage your IoT projects professionally. You can connect sensors, view real-time data, receive automatic alerts and much more ‚Äî no expertise required.

1.q: Do I need to know how to code to use the platform?
1.a: No. Our system is built for users of any experience level.

2.q: Can I receive alerts if a sensor exceeds a threshold?
2.a: Yes, you can set up custom alerts based on specific conditions.

3.q: How do I see real-time data?
3.a: Access a project to view the latest sensor readings and dynamic charts.

4.a: Yes, you can export readings, users, logs and more from the admin panel.
